raw akas.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Tartarughe Ninja
Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

akas: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Tartarughe Ninja Italy
Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles USA (fifth season title)
akas from release info: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Tartarughe Ninja Italy
Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles USA (fifth season title)

1.title: Scroll of the Demodragon
1.plot: The team faces a new enemy with mystical powers named Kavaxas.

2.title: The Forgotten Swordsman
2.plot: Karai searches for the Kuro Kabuto, claiming to be the rightful heir to the Foot Clan, when she encounters an old rival.

3.title: Heart of Evil
3.plot: Donnie's grudge with Don Vizioso threatens the Turtles' newest mission.

4.title: End Times
4.plot: The Turtles must defeat the mighty demodragon Kavaxas to prevent him from destroying the world.

5.title: When Worlds Collide
5.plot: The Newtralizer returns to New York City more powerful than ever before and joins forces with a dangerous, yet unexpected ally. With the help of Mona Lisa, the Turtles fight back to defend their city.

6.title: When Worlds Collide Part 2
6.plot: The Newtralizer returns to New York City more powerful than ever before and joins forces with a dangerous, yet unexpected ally. With the help of Mona Lisa, the Turtles fight back to defend their city.

7.title: Yojimbo
7.plot: The Turtles are transported to an alternate dimension, where they befriend the rabbit samurai and master swordsman: Miyamoto Usagi.

8.title: Osoroshi No Tabi - Scary Journey
8.plot: Usagi leads the Turtles through a haunted forest, where they end up encountering mischievous and highly dangerous spirits.

9.title: Kagayakei Kintaro
9.plot: As they reach their destination, Usagi and the Turtles must help young Kintaro fulfill his destiny.

10.title: Lone Rat and Cubs
10.plot: The turtles tell the back story behind their creation.

11.title: The Wasteland Warrior
11.plot: In a desolate alternate future, Raphael and Donatello fight to survive the clutches of dark mutant forces.

12.title: The Impossible Desert
12.plot: Raph, Donnie and a new ally find an old friend in the battle against the odds desert battle.

13.title: Carmaggedon
13.plot: After gaining the loyalty of both the Badger and Scale Tail Clans, Raph, Donbot, Mikey, and Kira head to Oasis. But, Maximus Kong is on their tails, and harboring a secret.

14.title: The Curse of Savanti Romero
14.plot: Renet returns to ask the Turtles for help, to stop Savanti Romero from unleashing an undead army on Modern-day New York.

15.title: The Crypt of Dracula
15.plot: Count Dracula is awakened, and turns Raphael into a vampire.

16.title: The Frankenstein Experiment
16.plot: Savanti recruits Frankenstein's Monster and will soon unleash his creatures on the 21st Century.

17.title: Monsters Among Us!
17.plot: Upon returning to present-day New York City, Renet and the Turtles discover (much to their horror) that the dystopian zombie-infested city is ruled by even more monsters, vampires and zombies than before, realizing that their previous failures to defeat Savanti when they had the chance has made the mishap plummet from bad to even worse. After returning to the safety of their underground sewer lair, they have one last chance to have order restored, but when their lair is discovered and trashed by Savanti's monster tribe, who infect Donnie and turn him into a vampire in...

18.title: Wanted: Bebop and Rocksteady
18.plot: The 1987 Shredder and Krang recruit the 2012 Bebop and Rocksteady, finding them better than their own incompetent counterparts.

19.title: The Foot Walks Again!
19.plot: The 2012 Ninja Turtles trains the 1987 Ninja Turtles in order to be ready for a dangerous mission to hunt down 1987 Shredder and Krang while April and Casey enlists Karai and Shinigami in order to track down Bebop (Zeck) and Rocksteady (Steranko).

20.title: The Big Blow Out
20.plot: After discovering a treacherous scheme, the Turtles, along with April, Casey, Karai and Shinigami, enlists the Mighty Mutanimals in order to defeat Bebop and Rocksteady. Meanwhile the 1987 turtles are trained enough to take down 1987 Shredder and Krang.

1.title: Rise of the Turtles: Part 1
1.plot: When Splinter allows his teenage sons, the Mutant Ninja Turtles, to visit the surface for the first time, they discover that the surface world isn't as simple as it first appears.

2.title: Rise of the Turtles: Part 2
2.plot: When Splinter allows his teenage sons, the Mutant Ninja Turtles, to visit the surface for the first time, they discover that the surface world isn't as simple as it first appears.

3.title: Turtle Temper
3.plot: The turtles are caught on a mobile phone's camera and must retrieve it. This is complicated by the phone's obnoxious owner, who constantly provokes Raph into losing his temper.

4.title: New Friend, Old Enemy
4.plot: To prove that Turtles can be friends with humans, Michelangelo uses a social networking site to befriend Chris Bradford, a famous martial artist.

5.title: I Think His Name Is Baxter Stockman
5.plot: When the Turtles sneak out against Splinter's wishes, they run afoul of Baxter Stockman, a deranged inventor in mechanical battle armor.

6.title: Metalhead
6.plot: Weary of using his simple bo staff to fight the technologically advanced Kraang, Donatello creates Metalhead, a remote-controlled robot turtle to fight in his place.

7.title: Monkey Brains
7.plot: Donatello and April investigate a scientist's disappearance, but discover a conspiracy regarding a bizarre psychic monkey instead.

8.title: Never Say Xever
8.plot: Leo fears his act of mercy has come back to haunt him when Xever holds a local noodle shop owner hostage.

9.title: The Gauntlet
9.plot: After April receives a warning from her imprisoned father, she and the Turtles embark on a mission to save him and stop the Kraang from detonating a mutagen bomb in the city.

10.title: Panic in the Sewers
10.plot: The Turtles must defend their home in the sewers when Bradford tries to destroy it with a dangerous chemical.

11.title: Mousers Attack!
11.plot: When simultaneous threats from the Purple Dragons and Baxter Stockman's mechanical Mousers force the Turtles to split into two groups, Donnie & Mikey must prove that their "B Team" is just as valuable as Leo & Raph's "A Team."

12.title: It Came from the Depths
12.plot: Michelangelo befriends an unstable mutant alligator who possesses a strange piece of Kraang technology, but the other Turtles aren't sure whether Leatherhead is a friend or a foe.

13.title: I, Monster
13.plot: The Turtles must face off against a new enemy, The Rat King, who threatens not only to take control of the city, but Splinter's mind as well.

14.title: New Girl in Town
14.plot: Leonardo, tired of Raphael's constant criticism, lets his brother try his hand at leadership for a while. Meanwhile, Leonardo meets a beautiful and dangerous female ninja who tries to lure Leonardo to the dark side.

15.title: The Alien Agenda
15.plot: The Turtles get their first taste of high school when April's school project draws Kraang attention.

16.title: The Pulverizer
16.plot: The Turtles meet their first fanboy when a teenage wannabe hero decides to fight crime and dress up as "The Pulverizer."

17.title: TCRI
17.plot: While breaking into the hostile environment of TCRI headquarters, the Turtles discover the true intent of the Kraang and resolve to stop the alien invasion once and for all.

18.title: Cockroach Terminator
18.plot: As the Turtles try to foil a Kraang invasion plot, they are hunted by a giant, indestructible cockroach.

19.title: Baxter's Gambit
19.plot: Fed up with being humiliated by Fishface and Dogpound and defeated by the Turtles, Baxter Stockman seeks revenge by luring both parties into a deadly labyrinth.

20.title: Enemy of My Enemy
20.plot: After witnessing the Kraang in action, Karai realizes the seriousness of the alien threat and approaches the Turtles to propose an alliance.

21.title: Karai's Vendetta
21.plot: While the Turtles are infiltrating an undersea Kraang base, the Foot Clan attempts to capture April, forcing her to fend for herself in a battle of wits against Karai.

22.title: Pulverizer Returns!
22.plot: When Shredder schemes to create a fearsome army of mutants, the Turtles have no choice but to rely on the help of the newest recruit to the Foot Clan: The Pulverizer!

23.title: Parasitica
23.plot: After Leonardo, Raphael, and Donatello fall under the control of a parasitic Wasp, Michelangelo must fight his brothers to save them.

24.title: Operation: Break Out
24.plot: Donatello breaks into a secret Kraang detention center in order to rescue Kirby O'Neil. But when he discovers they are trapped inside with a deadly mutant prisoner, he realizes that breaking in was the easy part.

25.title: Showdown: Part 1
25.plot: As the Turtles make a desperate assault on TCRI to shut down an alien portal, they find themselves engaging in the most difficult battle yet.

26.title: Showdown: Part 2
26.plot: As the Turtles make a desperate assault on TCRI to shut down an alien portal, they find themselves engaging in the most difficult battle yet.

1.title: The Mutation Situation
1.plot: When Shredder teams with the Kraang to receive a batch of mutagen, the Turtles' problems only get worse--even putting their friendship with April at stake.

2.title: Invasion of the Squirrelanoids
2.plot: While tracking mutagen, the Turtles bring a mutated squirrel back to the lair. When it starts multiplying, the Turtles must hunt the squirrel mutants and prevent them escaping into the city.

3.title: Follow the Leader
3.plot: When the Turtles face Shredder's newest threat, an army of Robot Foot Soldiers, Karai captures Leonardo and forces him to do battle with these new and improved ninjas that can adapt to his every move.

4.title: Mutagen Man Unleashed
4.plot: Donatello obsessively experiments with mutagen in a bid to find a cure for April's mutated father. Unfortunately this puts April in danger from a new threat--Mutagen Man!

5.title: Mikey Gets Shellacne
5.plot: Michelangelo is tired of being the "runt of the litter." But when he fools around with some mutagen, he gets a dangerous infection that is mutating out of control.

6.title: Target: April O'Neil
6.plot: April tries to resume a normal teenage life, but when Karai starts hunting her again, April realizes she may have put her new friend Casey Jones in danger as well.

7.title: Slash and Destroy
7.plot: The Turtles find themselves being hunted by a new threat--another mutant turtle called Slash, who has a personal vendetta against the brothers.

8.title: The Good, the Bad and Casey Jones
8.plot: After encountering mutants and ninjas, Casey Jones decides to take on "pure evil" alone. When he meets Raphael, the two hot-headed fighters must put their dislike for each other aside and work together against a common foe.

9.title: The Kraang Conspiracy
9.plot: Feeling left out of the action, April insists on joining the Turtles on a mission to TCRI, where they learn a shocking secret about April's past.

10.title: Fungus Humungous
10.plot: A fungus mutant spreading through the sewers causes the Turtles and April to experience their worst fears as Leonardo must face his greatest fear--losing his team.

11.title: Metalhead Rewired
11.plot: When Donnie upgrades Metalhead's artificial intelligence, he must decide if he can trust a sentient Metalhead... or if he has created a new foe.

12.title: Of Rats and Men
12.plot: The Rat King returns and tries to take control of Splinter again. Meanwhile, April leaves a cat with Mikey and he turns it into a mutant.

13.title: The Manhattan Project: Part 1
13.plot: Leonardo considers asking Splinter for help while facing Shredder's new assassin; Donnie must put aside his rivalry with Casey in order to uncover a Kraang plot.

14.title: The Manhattan Project: Part 2
14.plot: Facing Shredder's deadly new assassin, Leo must decide whether to risk his brother's lives or ask for Splinter's help. Donnie must put aside his rivalry with Casey in order to uncover a new Kraang plot.

15.title: Mazes & Mutants
15.plot: When the Turtles play a fantasy LARP game to get their mind off of things, they must separate the difference between fantasy and reality.

16.title: The Lonely Mutation of Baxter Stockman
16.plot: The Turtles create a retro-mutagen to help April's father;Stockman-Fly kidnaps April.

17.title: Newtralized!
17.plot: Raphael is worried about Casey's ability to handle big mutant threats; Raphael and Casey cross the paths of Slash and his new partner.

18.title: Pizza Face
18.plot: Michaelangelo must battle Pizza Face, a mutant pizza that eats humans, in order to save his family.

19.title: The Wrath of Tiger Claw
19.plot: When Tiger Claw returns, he vows to hunt and destroy the turtles. Meanwhile, Karai finds out the truth about her mother and real father, forcing her to make a life changing decision.

20.title: The Legend of the Kuro Kabuto
20.plot: As Leo tries to convince the team to attempt to rescue Karai, Anton Zeck steals Shredder's helmet.

21.title: Plan 10
21.plot: When Raph accidentally damages a Kraang machine, it allows him to switch brains with a Kraang. Now he must find a way to convince his brothers and Splinter that it's really him, before the Kraang controlling his body destroys his brothers or worse, reveals their location to the rest of the Kraang.

22.title: Vengeance is Mine
22.plot: Leo stages a rescue for Karai against Splinter's wishes.

23.title: A Chinatown Ghost Story
23.plot: Donnie becomes increasingly jealous of April and Casey's relationship; April is kidnapped by an evil spirit who intends to drain her powers.

24.title: Into Dimension X!
24.plot: After Mikey gets trapped in Dimension X to try and save Leatherhead, his brothers come to his rescue, but they discover that their little brother has changed.

25.title: The Invasion: Part 1
25.plot: Leo and Donnie disagree about their plan to stop the Kraang invasion. When Leo makes a critical mistake, he is separated from the team and Donnie must step up as a leader.

26.title: The Invasion: Part 2
26.plot: Leo and Donnie disagree about their plan to stop the Kraang invasion. When Leo makes a critical mistake, he is separated from the team and Donnie must step up as a leader.

1.title: Within the Woods
1.plot: After being provoked from stopping the Kraang invasion and being outmatched by Shredder and Kraang Prime, April, Casey and the Turtles take refuge inside a cabin far from the city in the woods.

2.title: A Foot Too Big
2.plot: When the Turtles discover Bigfoot in the woods, Donnie befriends it and insists they protect it from a hunter.

3.title: Buried Secrets
3.plot: The turtles find an old alien spacecraft that is connected to April's past.

4.title: The Croaking
4.plot: Mikey runs away and befriends a mutant frog. Only to learn the frog and his family have nefarious plans.

5.title: In Dreams
5.plot: The turtles get trapped in their dreams by Dream beavers. They can't escape except with the help of a man.

6.title: Race with the Demon
6.plot: When Casey and Donatello work together to build a hot rod, a mutant challenges them.

7.title: Eyes of the Chimera
7.plot: When Casey, Raph, Mikey, and Donnie are captured by a new mutant, April and Leo must overcome disabilities in order to save them.

8.title: Vision Quest
8.plot: Leo takes the Turtles to train in the woods in an advanced ninja ritual; the Turtles must overcome their weaknesses and face their enemies to become a true ninja.

9.title: Return to New York
9.plot: The turtles return to New York, facing the Kraang and Kraang Prime for a rematch to see who New York really belongs to.

10.title: Serpent Hunt
10.plot: As the Turtles search for Karai, they must deal with a city filled with Kraang and Shredder.

11.title: The Pig and the Rhino
11.plot: Donnie finishes a new batch of Retro-Mutagen in hope of saving Karai; the Turtles are hunted by Shredder's new henchmen, Bebop and Rocksteady.

12.title: Battle for New York: Part 1
12.plot: Leo is suspicious when Slash emerges leading a team called the Mighty Mutanimals; the Turtles must brave the bizarre world of Dimension X to save the enslaved people of New York.

13.title: Battle for New York: Part 2
13.plot: Leo is suspicious when Slash emerges leading a team called the Mighty Mutanimals; the Turtles must brave the bizarre world of Dimension X to save the enslaved people of New York.

14.title: Casey Jones vs. The Underworld
14.plot: Casey Jones thinks he can take on the criminal underworld on his own, but soon discovers that he is in over his head.

15.title: The Noxious Avenger
15.plot: A new mutant called Muckman starts to gain notoriety as NYC's "Monster Hero".

16.title: Clash of the Mutanimals
16.plot: The Shredder kidnaps and experiments on the Mighty Mutanimals.

17.title: Meet Mondo Gecko
17.plot: Michelangelo meets Mondo Gecko, a skateboarding mutant, and tries to save him from being condemned to a life of crime.

18.title: The Deadly Venom
18.plot: When Karai is brainwashed, she begins hunting the Turtles.

19.title: Turtles in Time
19.plot: The Turtles travel back in time and must help a young sorceress stop a dreadful warrior.

20.title: Tale of the Yokai
20.plot: The Turtles end up in Japan's past and must save a young Hamato Yoshi.

21.title: Attack of the Mega Shredder!
21.plot: Leonardo decides to sneak into Shredder's lair alone, and winds up facing the biggest mutant threat yet.

22.title: The Creeping Doom
22.plot: After an accident, Donnie finds himself slowly losing his intelligence.

23.title: The Fourfold Trap
23.plot: The Turtles are baited by an unknown enemy into deadly traps.

24.title: Dinosaur Seen in Sewers!
24.plot: Raph makes a new friend named Zog, an alien dinosaur. But Zog is hiding a dark secret.

25.title: Annihilation: Earth! Part 1
25.plot: When the turtles get word of the Kraang's return, they realize there is an even bigger threat coming to Earth.

26.title: Annihilation: Earth! Part 2
26.plot: When the turtles get word of the Kraang's return, they realize there is an even bigger threat coming to Earth.

1.title: Beyond the Known Universe
1.plot: The Turtles experience outer space and alien life for the first time.

2.title: The Moons of Thalos 3
2.plot: When the team crash lands on an ice moon along with an enemy, all must put their differences aside to survive.

3.title: The Weird World of Wyrm
3.plot: Casey Jones accidentally unleashes a fourth-dimensional being called Wyrm.

4.title: The Outlaw Armaggon
4.plot: Lord Dregg sets a fearsome bounty hunter, the shark mutant Armaggon, on the trail of the Turtles.

5.title: Riddle of the Ancient Aeons
5.plot: The team must journey through an ancient alien temple to get a piece of the black hole generator.But they get an ancient star which marks the Aeons

6.title: Journey to the Center of Mikey's Mind
6.plot: When microscopic aliens invade Mikey's mind, the Turtles have to chase them through the strange world of Mikey's subconscious.

7.title: The Arena of Carnage
7.plot: The turtles are captured and thrown into the Triceratons' battle area.

8.title: The War for Dimension X
8.plot: The Turtles must gain the trust of the Utrom Council in order to find the next piece of the black hole generator.

9.title: The Cosmic Ocean
9.plot: The Turtles journey through the cosmic ocean of Varuna, where they must proves themselves worthy to Hiidalra. Hiidalra is an aquatic alien queen who holds the second piece of the black hole generator.

10.title: Trans-Dimensional Turtles
10.plot: In the most cowabunga crossover ever, the 2012 and 1987 Turtles team up to stop the Krang from tinkering with dimensions.

11.title: Revenge of the Triceratons
11.plot: Donatello is feeling inferior to the Fugitoid, but his intellect is put to the test when the Triceratons attack.

12.title: The Evil of Dregg
12.plot: When Raphael loses his fighting mojo, he must overcome his feelings to save his brothers from certain doom.

13.title: The Ever-Burning Fire
13.plot: The team must overcome impossible odds in order to obtain the final Black Hole Generator piece.

14.title: Earth's Last Stand
14.plot: As the team finally reaches Earth, the Fugitoid reveals a horrible secret about his past.

15.title: City at War
15.plot: April faces a deadly, new enemy when she graduates to full Kunoichi; the Turtles must deal with the return of some old foes.

16.title: Broken Foot
16.plot: When Leonardo secretly allied himself with Karai, he gets himself into deeper danger than he could have realized.

17.title: The Insecta Trifecta
17.plot: The team faces Stockman-Fly's new insect minions, and Raph has to man up to overcome his fear of insects and lead the team.

18.title: Mutant Gangland
18.plot: Don Vizioso's gang tracks the Turtles with a slew of Anti-Mutant weapons.

19.title: Bat in the Belfry
19.plot: Michelangelo befriends some odd, new superheroes named Wingnut and Screwloose.

20.title: The Super Shredder
20.plot: For the first time, the Turtles encounter something they cannot defeat... The Super Shredder!

21.title: Darkest Plight
21.plot: The Turtle team hunts for their Sensei, but soon realizes they are being hunted as well.

22.title: The Power Inside Her
22.plot: Donatello becomes concerned and decides to test April, only to discover that her psychic abilities are rapidly growing in power.

23.title: Tokka vs. The World
23.plot: When Tokka returns after her presumable death, she finds out that her baby has been taken from her. After realizing this she violently searches for her lost baby.

24.title: The Tale of Tiger Claw
24.plot: A dangerous female mutant, by the name of Alopex, appears with a personal vendetta against Tiger Claw. The Turtles, April and Casey try to befriend her, but turns on them and furiously goes after Tiger Claw alone. Unfortunately for her, Tiger Claw has prepared for her unexpected arrival.

25.title: Requiem
25.plot: Super Shredder has returned with even greater vengeance, forcing the Turtles to enlist the combined aid of Splinter, April, Casey, Karai, Shinigami and the Mighty Mutanimals to destroy him once and for all.

26.title: Owari
26.plot: With the demise of their beloved father and Karai incapacitated, the turtles, April, and Casey infiltrate Super Shredder's new lair to put an end to Oroku Saki once and for all, no matter what it takes.

imdb.plot outline: Cowabunga, dude! The Turtles are back. Leonardo, Donatello, Raphael and Michelangelo are four mutant turtles, trained in the art of "ninjutsu" by their sensei, Master Splinter. The animated series explores their camaraderie as they learn to rely on one another as they unravel the mystery of their existence and train to become the heroes they are destined to be. And they're doing all that while trying to defeat Master Shredder, an old enemy of Splinter who is training a peculiar band of ninjas while hiding in New York City. When they are in the surface world, the Turtles become involved in a conspiracy involving alien creatures, robotic droids and missing scientists. And they come face to face with the glowing green substance that originally mutated them.
imdb.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
plot: Four ninja turtles, mutated by a mysterious alien substance, must rise up out of the sewers and defend their city against evil forces from both the past and present.::Nexus6Andy

Cowabunga, dude! The Turtles are back. Leonardo, Donatello, Raphael and Michelangelo are four mutant turtles, trained in the art of "ninjutsu" by their sensei, Master Splinter. The animated series explores their camaraderie as they learn to rely on one another as they unravel the mystery of their existence and train to become the heroes they are destined to be. And they're doing all that while trying to defeat Master Shredder, an old enemy of Splinter who is training a peculiar band of ninjas while hiding in New York City. When they are in the surface world, the Turtles become involved in a conspiracy involving alien creatures, robotic droids and missing scientists. And they come face to face with the glowing green substance that originally mutated them.::Jwelch5742
